def_en: Absolutism is a political system in which one ruler or leader has complete power and authority over a country.

def_cn: （尤指被认为错误的）绝对主义，绝对论
def_en: You can refer to someone's beliefs as absolutism if they think that their beliefs are true, right, or relevant in all situations, especially if you think they are wrong to behave in this way.
